title: Essential Reading: The Industry Council Arrives in America - RJ Ederer
description:
I read a short paper by economist Rupert J. Ederer, the man who translated Pesch's work into English. Writing in 1961, Ederer discusses the spontaneous creation of so-called industry councils that bind together the interests of management and labor.
